snippet: The controversial French comedian Dieudonné M’Bala M’Bala has been barred from entering Britain because of his extreme views, the Home Office said Monday.
abstract: Controversial French comedian Dieudonne M'Bala M'Bala has been barred from entering Britain because of his extreme views; has been criticized for having invented a gesture that resembles a Nazi salute and carries anti-Semitic overtones.
lead_paragraph: The controversial French comedian Dieudonné M’Bala M’Bala has been barred from entering Britain because of his extreme views, the Home Office said Monday.
